title: Ecell for Zn-Cr standard cell given half-reactions

content.question: The standard reduction potentials for the half-reactions related to the galvanic cell represented above are listed in the table below. Which of the following gives the value of E°cell for the cell?

skill.text: 5.F: Calculate, estimate, or predict an unknown quantity from known quantities by selecting and following a logical computational pathway and attending to precision (e.g., performing dimensional analysis and attending to significant figures).
